That's a fantastic idea! Getting your local sports hero's name engraved on the display case will make it even more special and personalized. It's a great way to pay tribute to their achievement and make the display case truly unique.

Both Steiner Sports and Fanatics are reputable companies that offer high-quality engraving services. They'll be able to help you create a beautiful, custom design that incorporates your local sports hero's name and any other details you'd like to include.

When you're ordering the engraving, make sure to provide the correct spelling of your hero's name and any other details you want to include. You may also want to consider the font style, size, and color to ensure it matches the overall aesthetic of the display case.

Here are a few more tips to keep in mind:

1. **Check the character limit**: Make sure to check the character limit for the engraving, as some display cases may have limited space.
2. **Choose a font that fits**: Select a font that fits the style of the display case and the overall aesthetic you're going for.
3. **Consider the color**: Choose an engraving color that complements the display case and the baseball. You may want to match the team colors or choose a neutral color like silver or gold.
4. **Proofread carefully**: Double-check the spelling and details before finalizing the order to ensure everything is accurate.

By getting your local sports hero's name engraved on the display case, you'll create a truly unique and meaningful piece that celebrates their achievement and your connection to them.
